column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I loved Cafe Ba Ba Reeba! And so did my whole party! It wasn't dirty at all like some said
column2: and the service was great! We were sitting in what we thought was a bit of a draft and we asked to move
column3: even though it was pretty busy
column4: and without a single roll of the eye
column5: we were moved to a warmer area. Our server was very friendly and helpful
column6: and that was much appreciated since none of us had been before.
